Keywords: Asgardian , Deity , Future , Mystical , Past
Real Name: Loki Laufeyson
Special Powers
(+5 POINTS) THE TESSERACT: Loki starts the game with the Disney+ #s006 Tesseract equipped.
DUPLICATION CASTING: Shape Change. When Loki uses it, after resolutions you may place Loki a number of squares away from his current square equal to the d6 result.

Comments
July 8, 2022
BubbleBuster101
Combined with Mobius, it could be nice to phase with the tesseract, hopefully roll a good BCF roll, and then have the prob from the tesseract. There’s some tinkering to do, but I feel like the TVA pieces could be combined with some other shared keyworded figures for some fun teams
May 31, 2022
Bobcat2022
Well, can’t fault this piece for being unclear about how to play it. Run him up to an opposing figure, ideally one with a range focus, and hope his CR/SC let him survive the turn until he can stick a blade in 'em. This point line really wants that Tesseract, though. In Sealed, I might tend to go for the lower line.
May 2, 2022
Goop
He's a very defensive piece that you are encouraged to move every turn to get the probability from tesseract. Paying 75pts for a piece you primarily want to move every turn is a lot. With stealth/cr/blades/SC/mystics/special power i dont see many people wanting to rush in and attack him. I would do my best to ignore him, he's not that threatening for his cost. I'd probably try and use him mostly as tie ups.
